source.query: select c.customer_id as source_customer_key , c.account_number , c.customer_type , t.name as territory , t.country_region_code , cr.name as country_name , c.modified_date , c.row_number as stage_customer_row_number , c.batch_id as stage_customer_batch_id from stage_customer c , stage_salesterritory t,stage_countryregion cr where c.territory_id = t.territory_id AND cr.country_region_code = t.country_region_code AND c.batch_id > ${batch_id}
